name: DoomBeats
description:
Stay on the beat while the world comes to an end! The more you hit correct notes, more instruments you hear and more band members play together!

Tap anywhere on the screen (except the vinyl) when the marker hits the needle to keep the rhythm and the instruments going. When you see a drum kit on the vinyl, you can tap to generate your own snare sound!

         

  BunnyHug         GamaMoon         BepopBirdie
